data.name: Macheesmo: The Animated Series: The Game
data.detailed_description:
Based on the classic Animated Series, Macheesmo: The Animated Series: The Game is a wacky, irreverent platformer with tight controls and creative level-design. Originally published in 1991, this game has been faithfully ported to Steam!

Play as Macheesmo, now transformed into a slice of American Cheese, and on a mission to stop the RATKING from transforming the entire world into cheese!
Jump, swing, and climb your way through a variety of platforming levels, defeat the RATKING and find out who is behind the madness once and for all!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The Classic 1991 Platformer comes to Steam!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 12
  • Processor: Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
